item.title: Why the Stock Market Isn't a Zero-Sum Game
item.description: Did you think stock investing was a game of taking someone else’s money? From the theory that it’s a ‘positive-sum game’ where the whole pie grows thanks to corporate value creation, to the reality that short-term trading has the brutal nature of a ‘zero-sum game’â€”our three experts clearly define the true nature of investing.
